testcase.name: TC10 product detail should be visible
testcase.system-out: When Launch browser.........................................................passed Then Navigate to url "HomePageUrl"..........................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed And Click on Products button................................................passed Then Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully.............passed Then The products list is visible...........................................passed Then Click on View Product of first product.................................passed Then User is landed to product detail page..................................passed Then Verify that detail detail is visible: product name, category, price, availability, condition, brand.passed
